categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Shellaster was a Human male and major within the reconstituted Sith Empire serving on Dromund Kaas. At one point during his career, he was stationed outside Kaas City where he was tasked to dealing with an invasion of off-world troops under the command of the rogue Sith Lord Tytonus, an ally of Lord Grathan.
